explains: n. 嘶嘶声；热情（非正式）

sentences.en: The vegetables dropped into the boiling oil with a sizzle.
sentences.cn: 欻拉一声，把菜倒进了滚油锅里。

sentences.en: Sell the sizzle, not the steak.
sentences.cn: 卖的是烤牛排的咝咝声，而不是牛排。

sentences.en: Even the emerging world has lost some of its sizzle.
sentences.cn: 就连新兴世界也部分略减。
